title: Boutique Yarra Valley Heritage Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Dripping in 19th-century charm, Yarra Valley Grand Hotel is an icon in the heart of one of Victoria's most acclaimed wine regions. Tenderly restored to its original splendour, this heritage hotel is the place to be in the vine-laced hills of the Yarra Valley. Enjoy a historic stay that combines local-favourite pub fare with beautifully preserved architecture and a central Yarra Glen location, just a short drive from the region's lauded cellar doors, multi-award-winning distilleries, decadent dairies and hoppy breweries.

With the hustle of Melbourne less than an hour away, escape city life and discover this delightful gourmand's escape, where you can set up a wine tasting at the likes of Zonzo Estate, visit the iconic Yarra Valley Chocolaterie & Ice Creamery and stroll through the manicured Alowyn Gardens, before returning to this country retreat steeped in old-world charm. Step back in time as you’re whisked through the hotel’s grand arched doorways into unique, beautifully furnished rooms, transported to the homely pub and lured into the beer garden of Herb’s Backyard Pizza, where you can enjoy an extensive range of local brews, wine and live music on select weekends.
offer_address: 19 Bell Street Service Road, Yarra Glen, Victoria 3775, Australia

title: Boutique Yarra Valley Heritage Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Steeped in 19th-century charm, this tucked-away gem in one of Victoria's premier wine regions has been carefully restored, standing as the ultimate haven amidst the vineyard-draped hills of the Yarra Valley. Dating back to 1888, this vintage establishment blends old-world charm with modern commodities.

Enjoy a historic stay where timeless architecture meets local-favourite cuisine, nestled in the charming locale of Yarra Glen. This hotel has beautifully appointed   rooms and suites, each with their own charm and character. When you're ready to kick back and relax, check out the menu at Herb's Backyard Pizza for some local pub grub or the extensive wine list featuring some of the best Yarra Valley has to offer.

Toast to vineyard adventures at nearby cellar doors, vineyards and distilleries, such as the lauded Zonzo Estate or the Four Pillars Gin Distillery for a taste of local craftsmanship. Delight your sweet tooth at the Yarra Valley Chocolaterie & Ice Creamery, a paradise for chocolate lovers.
offer_address: 19 Bell Street Service Road, Yarra Glen, Victoria 3775, Australia

title: Boutique Yarra Valley Heritage Hotel with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Dining Credit
description:
Steeped in 19th-century charm, this hidden gem in the heart of one of Victoria's premier wine regions has been carefully restored, standing as the ultimate haven amid the vineyard-draped hills of the Yarra Valley. Dating back to its construction in 1888, this vintage establishment blends old-world charm with modern comforts.

Enjoy a stay where timeless architecture meets craft cuisine, nestled in the charming locale of Yarra Glen. It's the perfect location to explore the region's renowned cellar doors, vineyards and distilleries. When you're ready to kick back and relax, tuck into local pub grub at the onsite Bistro, a pie from Herb's Backyard Pizza or the extensive wine list available at the Public Bar, featuring some of the Yarra Valley's best drops.
offer_address: 19 Bell Street Service Road, Yarra Glen, Victoria 3775, Australia
